statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM CustomerTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_type FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE customer_id = 1234 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerTransactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-06-01' AND is_fraudulent = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_patterns WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraudulent_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM customer_transactions c JOIN fraudulent_patterns f ON c.transaction_id = f.pattern_id WHERE f.is_active = TRUE GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC, avg_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'credit card fraud';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, pattern_type FROM fraud_patterns WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, reason FROM FraudulentTransactions;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT customer_id, last_activity_date FROM SuspiciousCustomers ORDER BY last_activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.name AS customer_name, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id

SELECT f.flag_reason, ft.transaction_id, c.name AS flagged_by FROM flagged_transactions ft JOIN fraud_patterns f ON ft.flag_reason = f.pattern_description JOIN customers c ON ft.flagger_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY ft.transaction_id ASC
